name: Nom Nom Zombies
description:
Short Description:
A survival zombie game with intense gameplay and 3D graphics and visuals. Go for a headshot and kill as many zombies as you can in this endless shooting game and survive as long as possible. It’s free, fun to play with so many levels, challenges and surprises ahead

Long Description:
It’s apocalypse and zombies have taken over our favorite planet, the earth. You are the only survival and have to fight against the invader zombies. So, do you think you’ve got what it takes to kill as many zombies as possible in this endless zombie shooting game?
The stunning 3D graphics, clean and neat design, realistic surrounding sounds, cool sound effects, engaging story, cute characters, smooth gameplay and endless challenges are just a few reasons to fall in love with this apocalypse survival game. The game is available to download for free and the addictive gameplay can easily make you play the game over and over without noticing the time.

How to Play NomNom Zombies:
To control the cute character and move him around and shoot at the zombies, you just need to use the perfectly placed virtual buttons on the screen. The gameplay is so simple that you’ll get used to it after trying this zombie game for a few times. After that, you just need to focus on killing zombies as many as possible and survive as long as possible. While you are all alone in this zombie survival game, there are some powerful weapons that can come handy. To unlock these weapons, you need to boost up your combo meter by killing more zombies at the same time.
Some of available weapons to unlock are: Pistol, Grenades, Rapid fire (UZI), Scatter Shot (Shotgun), Explosive barrels (explodes when shot or hit), Barriers (creates walls to hold of zombies or alter routes of zombies), Mines (explodes when zombies walk over it) and Rocket launcher.
There are also 8 different levels and worlds you can play in. Each level comes with its own unique design and environments to make sure you never get bored. Speaking of not getting bored, make sure to take a look at the character selection menu, as you’ll definitely find is so fun and cool.
In different levels, you’ll face different zombies to kill, so you should follow different strategies and try to unlock more weapons in order to be equipped with some powerful arsenal.
Don’t forget that zombies are hungry and brutal, and all they think of is eating some fresh meat. So, fight, go for headshot, kill and survive in this zombie survival game.

NomNom Zombies: Kill & Survive Main Features at a Glance:
• Easy to learn, but hard to master
• Wonderful 3D graphics with realistic music and sound
• Endless zombies to kill
• 8 unique levels: Grave Yard, Forest, warehouse, street, prison, church and army base
• 20 different characters and hair styles to choose
• Daily free coins
• Arsenal of powerful different guns and weapons
• Leaderboard feature to challenge family and friends (Game Center)
• Optimized for mobiles, tablets, and even TVs
• Fun for all ages
• Free

NomNom Zombies offers everything you should expect from a perfect zombie shooting game. You get to aim, shoot and kill zombies, survive the attacks, boost up your combo meter and collect coins to unlock new levels and characters.
The leaderboard feature lets you compete with friends and family and find out who has killed the most zombies.

Download NomNom Zombies for free and let us know about any bugs, feature requests or any other suggestions. And stay in touch for more challenges, levels, characters, weapons and surprises in this zombie action shooting game
